mapper.sql: a.order_id AS "orderId", a.api_order_id AS "apiOrderId", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.area_name AS "areaName", a.baili_synchor_state AS "bailiSynchorState", a.brand_id AS "brandId", a.brand_name AS "brandName", a.express_id AS "expressId", a.channel_confirm_time AS "channelConfirmTime", a.channel__postage AS "channelPostage", a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.channel_name AS "channelName", a.channel_send_time AS "channelSendTime", a.channels_before AS "channelsBefore", a.channels_num_before AS "channelsNumBefore", a.check_user_id AS "checkUserId", a.check_user_name AS "checkUserName", a.city_id AS "cityId", a.city_name AS "cityName", a.cust_postage AS "custPostage", a.cust_addr AS "custAddr", a.cust_name AS "custName", a.cust_tel AS "custTel", a.custom_order_id AS "customOrderId", a.discount AS "discount", a.express_comp AS "expressComp", a.express_comp_ori AS "expressCompOri", a.tracking_no AS "trackingNo", a.postage AS "postage", a.err_msg AS "errMsg", a.fact_express_id AS "factExpressId", a.fact_discount AS "factDiscount", a.fact_express_comp AS "factExpressComp", a.fact_postage AS "factPostage", a.fact_goods_count AS "factGoodsCount", a.gender_id AS "genderId", a.gender_name AS "genderName", a.goods_count AS "goodsCount", a.product_no AS "productNo", a.tag_price AS "tagPrice", a.innner_size AS "innnerSize", a.catagroy_id AS "catagroyId", a.catagroy_name AS "catagroyName", a.is_invoice AS "isInvoice", a.is_service AS "isService", a.oid AS "oid", a.order_fahuo_state AS "orderFahuoState", a.order_ip AS "orderIp", a.order_parent_id AS "orderParentId", a.payment AS "payment", a.order_price_pre AS "orderPricePre", a.order_state AS "orderState", a.order_state_time AS "orderStateTime", a.pay_time AS "payTime", a.agent_id AS "agentId", a.agent_name AS "agentName", a.out_product_no AS "outProductNo", a.out_size AS "outSize", a.commission_agio AS "commissionAgio", a.commission AS "commission", a.post_fee_commission AS "postFeeCommission", a.post_fee_commission_pre AS "postFeeCommissionPre", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.province_name AS "provinceName", a.remark AS "remark", a.season_id AS "seasonId", a.season_name AS "seasonName", a.shop_id AS "shopId", a.shop_name AS "shopName", a.status AS "status", a.tid AS "tid", a.package_price AS "packagePrice", a.logistics_type AS "logisticsType", a.declaration_form_date AS "declarationFormDate", a.order_src AS "orderSrc", a.import_over_price AS "importOverPrice", a.outer_iid AS "outerIid", a3.name AS "area.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a3 ON a3.id = a.area_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sup_order a
AND a.order_id LIKE '%'||#{orderId}||'%' '%'+#{orderId}+'%' concat('%',#{orderId},'%')
AND a.cust_name LIKE '%'||#{custName}||'%' '%'+#{custName}+'%' concat('%',#{custName},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sup_order( order_id, api_order_id, area_id, area_name, baili_synchor_state, brand_id, brand_name, express_id, channel_confirm_time, channel__postage, channel_id, channel_name, channel_send_time, channels_before, channels_num_before, check_user_id, check_user_name, city_id, city_name, cust_postage, cust_addr, cust_name, cust_tel, custom_order_id, discount, express_comp, express_comp_ori, tracking_no, postage, err_msg, fact_express_id, fact_discount, fact_express_comp, fact_postage, fact_goods_count, gender_id, gender_name, goods_count, product_no, tag_price, innner_size, catagroy_id, catagroy_name, is_invoice, is_service, oid, order_fahuo_state, order_ip, order_parent_id, payment, order_price_pre, order_state, order_state_time, pay_time, agent_id, agent_name, out_product_no, out_size, commission_agio, commission, post_fee_commission, post_fee_commission_pre, province_id, province_name, remark, season_id, season_name, shop_id, shop_name, status, tid, package_price, logistics_type, declaration_form_date, order_src, import_over_price, outer_iid ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{apiOrderId}, #{area.id}, #{areaName}, #{bailiSynchorState}, #{brandId}, #{brandName}, #{expressId}, #{channelConfirmTime}, #{channelPostage}, #{channelId}, #{channelName}, #{channelSendTime}, #{channelsBefore}, #{channelsNumBefore}, #{checkUserId}, #{checkUserName}, #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{custPostage}, #{custAddr}, #{custName}, #{custTel}, #{customOrderId}, #{discount}, #{expressComp}, #{expressCompOri}, #{trackingNo}, #{postage}, #{errMsg}, #{factExpressId}, #{factDiscount}, #{factExpressComp}, #{factPostage}, #{factGoodsCount}, #{genderId}, #{genderName}, #{goodsCount}, #{productNo}, #{tagPrice}, #{innnerSize}, #{catagroyId}, #{catagroyName}, #{isInvoice}, #{isService}, #{oid}, #{orderFahuoState}, #{orderIp}, #{orderParentId}, #{payment}, #{orderPricePre}, #{orderState}, #{orderStateTime}, #{payTime}, #{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{outProductNo}, #{outSize}, #{commissionAgio}, #{commission}, #{postFeeCommission}, #{postFeeCommissionPre}, #{provinceId}, #{provinceName}, #{remark}, #{seasonId}, #{seasonName}, #{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{status}, #{tid}, #{packagePrice}, #{logisticsType}, #{declarationFormDate}, #{orderSrc}, #{importOverPrice}, #{outerIid} )

#{orderPricePre}, order_state = #{orderState}, order_state_time = #{orderStateTime}, pay_time = #{payTime}, agent_id = #{agentId}, agent_name = #{agentName}, out_product_no = #{outProductNo}, out_size = #{outSize}, commission_agio = #{commissionAgio}, commission = #{commission}, post_fee_commission = #{postFeeCommission}, post_fee_commission_pre = #{postFeeCommissionPre}, province_id =
